page.title: 02HARPER ADAMS COLLEGE EDGMOND
page.content: At{Harper Adams Agricultural College (HAAC) there are over 10 Departments and over 70 Staff. Some of the departments follow:- Animal Production, Animal Science, Crop Production, Crop Science, Management and Marketing and Agricultural Engineering. The College was founded under the will of{Thomas Harper Adams, in 1900, the aim being to provide education for those who wish to pursue a career in Agriculture and Management. The{courses}offered by the college in 1985 are - BSc. in Agricultural Technology, Higher National Diploma in Agriculture Higher National Diploma in Marketing and Business Administration, a Higher National Diploma in Agricultural Engineering. A National Diploma in Poultry and a Postgraduate Diploma in Crop Protection can also be obtained.
